resources.string: There is an authentication error, try again.
The data entered was invalid, try again.
Oops an error occurred with the server, sorry about that, please try again.
Something has gone wrong, if you see this message often please contact us.
Oops, it looks like something has gone wrong on your side, please try again.
Oops, it looks like something has gone wrong on our side, please try again.
Looks like you\'re not connected to the internet, reconnect and try again.
We\'ve sent too many request too quickly, let\'s try again.
